com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.camera

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.Entity
      • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.physicalObject.PhysicalObject
        • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.entity.camera.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends PhysicalObject
    Camera in the world. Has no physical presence. Has location and direction. TODO confirm the calculated pose matches the forward/up/right values
    Author:
    Dan Royer
